title: ISic002746. I.Sicily inscription 002746
body:
1[Δ]ι̣ονύσιος [Ἡρ]α̣κλ[είδου]
2[Ἀλεξ]α̣νδρεὺς ἐ[ποίει]

1[.].ΟΝΥΣΙΟΣ[..].ΚΛ[.....]
2[....].ΝΔΡΕΥΣΕ[.....]

Facsimile Images

Apparatus criticus

  • Text of Ampolo and Erdas 2019;
  • line.2: or ἐ[ποίησεν]

English translation

Dionysios, son of Herakleides, the Alexandrian, made this

Italian translation

Dionysius, figlio di Herakleides, alessandrino, fece

commentary

bibliography

  • 49.1325 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000796
  • 47.1452 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000796
  • 41.0833 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000796

  • Nenci 1991 916-917 no.2 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001414
  • Ampolo and Erdas 2019 G18 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001036
